title: Jane Scott: Pioneering Rock & Roll Journalist
teaser: The archives of Plain Dealer music writer Jane Scott are being organized and digitized at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
contentencoded:
A chapter of rock and roll history is being preserved with the help of a grant from the state of Ohio. The archives of Plain Dealer music writer Jane Scott are being organized and digitized at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Library and Archives. David C. Barnett of Here & Now contributing station WCPN reports on the legacy of a music journalism pioneer.

  • Read more on this story and see more photos via WCPN

Reporter

  • David C. Barnett, senior arts reporter for WCPN/ideastream. He tweets @DCBstream.
